name: Rivaz of the Claw
oracle_text:
Menace
{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon creature spells.
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard.
Whenever you cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard, it gains "When this creature dies, exile it."

name: Soul of Windgrace
oracle_text:
Whenever Soul of Windgrace enters the battlefield or attacks, you may put a land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control.
{G}, Discard a land card: You gain 3 life.
{1}{R}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.
{2}{B}, Discard a land card: Soul of Windgrace gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

name: Rona, Sheoldred's Faithful
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 1 life.
You may cast Rona, Sheoldred's Faithful from your graveyard by discarding two cards in addition to paying its other costs.

name: Tatyova, Steward of Tides
oracle_text:
Land creatures you control have flying.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, up to one target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

name: Jhoira, Ageless Innovator
oracle_text: {T}: Put two ingenuity counters on Jhoira, Ageless Innovator, then you may put an artifact card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield, where X is the number of ingenuity counters on Jhoira.

name: Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts a spell that targets only a single creature other than Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief, you may copy that spell. The copy targets Ivy. (A copy of an Aura spell becomes a token.)

name: King Darien XLVIII
oracle_text:
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
{3}{G}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on King Darien and create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
Sacrifice King Darien: Creature tokens you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

name: Jodah, the Unifier
oracle_text:
Legendary creatures you control get +X/+X where X is the number of legendary creatures you control.
Whenever you cast a legendary spell from your hand, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a legendary nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Lagomos, Hand of Hatred
oracle_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
{T}: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Activate only if five or more creatures died this turn.

name: Raff, Weatherlight Stalwart
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control. If you do, draw a card.
{3}{W}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Queen Allenal of Ruadach
oracle_text:
Queen Allenal of Ruadach's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus a 1/1 white Soldier creature token are created instead.

name: Najal, the Storm Runner
oracle_text:
You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.
Whenever Najal, the Storm Runner attacks, you may pay {2}. If you do, when you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Ratadrabik of Urborg
Rulik Mons, Warren Chief
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Rulik Mons, Warren Chief attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you didn't put a card onto the battlefield this way, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

name: Rona, Sheoldred's Faithful
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 1 life.
You may cast Rona, Sheoldred's Faithful from your graveyard by discarding two cards in addition to paying its other costs.

name: Sol'Kanar the Tainted
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• Draw a card.
• Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
• Sol'Kanar the Tainted deals 3 damage to up to one other target creature or planeswalker.
• Exile Sol'Kanar, then return it to the battlefield under an opponent's control.

name: Shanna, Purifying Blade
oracle_text:
Lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. If you do, draw X cards. X can't be greater than the amount of life you gained this turn.

name: Tatyova, Steward of Tides
oracle_text:
Land creatures you control have flying.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, up to one target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

name: Stenn, Paranoid Partisan
oracle_text:
As Stenn, Paranoid Partisan enters the battlefield, choose a card type other than creature or land.
Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{W}{U}: Exile Stenn. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Soul of Windgrace
oracle_text:
Whenever Soul of Windgrace enters the battlefield or attacks, you may put a land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control.
{G}, Discard a land card: You gain 3 life.
{1}{R}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.
{2}{B}, Discard a land card: Soul of Windgrace gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

name: Zar Ojanen, Scion of Efrava
oracle_text: Domain — Whenever Zar Ojanen, Scion of Efrava becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with toughness less than the number of basic land types among lands you control.

name: Tura Kennerüd, Skyknight
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

name: Tori D'Avenant, Fury Rider
oracle_text:
Vigilance, trample
Whenever Tori D'Avenant, Fury Rider attacks, all other attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Other red attacking creatures you control gain trample until end of turn Untap each other white attacking creature you control.

name: Zur, Eternal Schemer
oracle_text:
Flying
Enchantment creatures you control have deathtouch, lifelink, and hexproof.
{1}{W}: Target non-Aura enchantment you control becomes a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to its mana value.

name: The Circle of Loyalty
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Knight you control.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a legendary spell, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
{3}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

name: Day of Destiny
oracle_text: Legendary creatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"If you wish to die as a hero, you must first live as one."
—General Takeno

name: Anafenza, Kin-Tree Spirit
oracle_text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Martyred for worshipping her ancestors, she now walks among them.

name: Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor_text: "The Ancestor saved us for a purpose."

name: Odric, Lunarch Marshal
oracle_text: At the beginning of each combat, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.

name: Jazal Goldmane
oracle_text:
First strike
{3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
flavor_text:
"As my kha, he is the source of my inspiration. As my brother, he is the embodiment of my aspirations."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Hero of Precinct One
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor_text: When the established order falters, what remains are ordinary people and their struggle to survive.

name: Generous Gift
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
flavor_text: The best presents are impossible to regift.

name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
oracle_text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible
flavor_text: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.

name: Urza's Ruinous Blast
oracle_text:
(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)
Exile all nonland permanents that aren't legendary.
flavor_text: Centuries ago, one man's vengeance plunged the world into ice and darkness.

name: Unbreakable Formation
oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Echoing Truth
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.

name: Drana, Liberator of Malakir
oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever Drana, Liberator of Malakir deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control.
flavor_text: "I will not live as a slave. If you would be free, then fight alongside me."

name: Ambition's Cost
oracle_text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: "I will be your most demanding master, Liliana. But I have great things in mind for you."

name: Josu Vess, Lich Knight
oracle_text:
Kicker {5}{B} (You may pay an additional {5}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Menace
When Josu Vess, Lich Knight enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create eight 2/2 black Zombie Knight creature tokens with menace.

name: Hero's Downfall
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Odric resisted the vampire's curse with all his strength. But after a lifetime of fighting monsters, he was doomed to become one himself.

name: Read the Bones
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

name: Painful Truths
oracle_text: Converge — You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor_text: As the Eldrazi spread, no secret that could give Zendikar's defenders an advantage was considered too dangerous to seek.

name: Night's Whisper
oracle_text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
flavor_text:
"I have seen things that would reduce a weaker person to blubbering and raving. Want to hear about them?"
—Vraska

name: "Baird, Gym Bro"
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power greater than its base power, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

name: "Garna, Aggro Champ"
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, draw a card if it was attacking. Otherwise, "Garna, Aggro Champ" deals 1 damage to each opponent.

name: Meria, Scholar of Antiquity
oracle_text:
Tap an untapped nontoken artifact you control: Add {G}.
Tap two untapped nontoken artifacts you control: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
flavor_text: "Why fear artifice? Is it not also of this world?"

name: Tribute to Urborg
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets an additional -1/-1 each turn for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

name: Meria, Scholar of Antiquity
oracle_text:
Tap an untapped nontoken artifact you control: Add {G}.
Tap two untapped nontoken artifacts you control: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

name: Phyrexian Rager
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: "Resist if you must. It makes no difference. As with Mirrodin, your world will bow to Phyrexia."
